content:
I’m a Senior Researcher at Waabi. Here, I apply my own research to the development of self-driving vehicle technology, focusing on autonomy algorithms ranging from perception to motion planning.
I am also a PhD student at the University of Toronto supervised by Professor Raquel Urtasun, and a member of the Machine Learning Group and the Vector Institute.
summary:
I’m a Senior Researcher at Waabi. Here, I apply my own research to the development of self-driving vehicle technology, focusing on autonomy algorithms ranging from perception to motion planning.
I am also a PhD student at the University of Toronto supervised by Professor Raquel Urtasun, and a member of the Machine Learning Group and the Vector Institute.
title: Sergio Casas

summary: Talk at [EPFL VITA Reading Group](https://www.epfl.ch/labs/vita/reading-groups/) covering my research on PnP from IntentNet to ILVM
title: Joint Perception and Prediction (PnP)

summary: Prediction part of the tutorial [All about self-driving](http://www.allaboutselfdriving.com/) at [CVPR20](http://cvpr2020.thecvf.com/)
title: Prediction Tutorial

summary: _CVPR 2021_ __(Best Paper Candidate, Oral)__ Interpretable end-to-end neural motion planning without high-definition maps
title: MP3: A Unified Model to Map, Perceive, Predict and Plan

summary: _arXiv preprint 2021_ Contingency planning from diverse joint trajectory samples for all actors in the scene
title: LookOut: Diverse Multi-Future Prediction and Planning for Self-Driving

summary: _CVPR 2021_ Realistic long-term vehicle behavior simulation learned from imitation and common sense
title: TrafficSim: Learning to Simulate Realistic Multi-Agent Behaviors

summary: _arXiv preprint 2021_ Cost-aware active learning allows for fine-grained selection of examples through partially labeled scenes
title: Just Label What You Need: Fine-Grained Active Selection for Perception and Prediction through Partially Labeled Scenes

summary: _CVPR 2021_ Critical scenario generation by modifying the actors' trajectories in a physically plausible manner and updating the LiDAR sensor data to create realistic observations of the perturbed world
title: AdvSim: Generating Safety-Critical Scenarios for Self-Driving Vehicles

summary: _CVPR 2021_ Efficient end-to-end joint localization, perception, prediction able to correct localization errors
title: Deep Multi-Task Learning for Joint Localization, Perception, and Prediction

summary: _IROS 2021_ Model-agnostic approach to dataset curation for autonomy tasks
title: Diverse Complexity Measures for Dataset Curation in Self-driving

summary: _IROS 2021_ Hybrid instance-based and instance-free approach to pedestrian behavior prediction
title: Safety-Oriented Pedestrian Motion and Scene Occupancy Forecasting

summary:
_CoRL 2020_ __(Spotlight)__
Existing LiDAR perception systems wait 100ms just to build a sweep. StrObe instead does streaming detection from LiDAR packets and achieve an end-to-end latency of 21ms
title: Strobe: Streaming Object Detection from LiDAR Packets

summary: _ECCV 2020_ ILVM characterizes the joint distribution over multiple actors' future trajectories
title: Implicit Latent Variable Model for Scene-Consistent Motion Forecasting

summary: _ECCV 2020_ End-to-end neural motion planner based on interpretable semantic scene occupancies
title: Perceive, Predict, and Plan: Safe Motion Planning Through Interpretable Semantic Representations

summary: _ECCV 2020_ Multi-level fusion of LiDAR & Radar for object detection and velocity estimation
title: RadarNet: Exploiting Radar for Robust Perception of Dynamic Objects

summary: _IROS 2020_ __(Oral)__ Incorporate non-differentiable prior knowledge for behavior forecasting
title: The Importance of Prior Knowledge in Precise Multimodal Prediction

summary: _CVPR 2020_ Tracking in the loop in joint perception and prediction
title: PnPNet: End-to-End Perception and Prediction with Tracking in the Loop

summary: _ICRA 2020_ Relational reasoning for multi-agent behavior prediction from sensors
title: Spatially-Aware Graph Neural Networks for Relational Behavior Forecasting from Sensor Data

summary: _CoRL 2019_ __(Spotlight)__ Long-term pedestrian forecasting with occupancy grid maps
title: Discrete Residual Flow for Probabilistic Pedestrian Behavior Prediction

summary: _CVPR 2019_ __(Oral)__ Neural motion planner from LiDAR and HD maps
title: End-to-end Interpretable Neural Motion Planner

summary: _CoRL 2018_ __(Spotlight)__ Joint perception and prediction from LiDAR point clouds and HD maps
title: Intentnet:  Learning to Predict Intention from Raw Sensor Data
